process.command:
dataset_id text not null,   
			dataset_name varchar not null,
			institution_id text not null,
			region_id varchar not null,
			region_category varchar not null,
			title varchar,
			label varchar,
			data_url varchar,
			meta_url varchar,
			meta_path varchar,
			data_dir varchar,
			data_file varchar,
			start_date date,
			end_date date, 
			primary_key(dataset_id)

plot_id text,
			site_id text,
			area_m2 integer,
			user_own_id varchar,
			biome varchar,
			share smallint default 5,
			lat double precision,
			lon double precision,
			create_date date default current_date,
			primary_key (plot_id)

plot_id text,
			site_id text,
			area_m2 integer,
			user_own_id varchar,
			biome varchar,
			share smallint default 5,
			create_date date default current_date,
			primary_key (plot_id)

plot_id text,
			obs_date date,
			dom_surface varchar,
			dom_surf_share integer,
			dom_use varchar,
			dom_use_share integer,
			dom_cover varchar,
			dom_cover_share integer,
			erosion varchar,
			erosion_share integer,
			dom_mngmt varchar,
			primary_key (plot_id, obs_date)

plot_id text,
			topo_scale integer,
			slope real,
			aspect real,
			elevation real,
			prof_c real,
			long_c real,
			cros_c real,
			cellstats varchar,
			primary_key (plot_id,topo_scale,cellstats)

plot_id text,
			s_scale integer,
			l_scale integer,
			TPI real,
			TRI real,
			TPIlf varchar,
			curvlf varchar,
			cellstats varchar,
			primary_key (plot_id,s_scale,l_scale,cellstats)

plot_id text,
			runoff real,
			obs_date varchar,
			primary_key (plot_id,runoff,obs_date)

plot_id text,
			obs_date date,
			species varchar default 'all',
			spshare integer,
			spcover integer,
			spvol real,
			spage real,
			spagb real,
			spstemdens real,
			spbiomass real,
			spheight real,
			spharvest real,
			spharvestdate date,
			spphase varchar,
			primary_key (plot_id,obs_date,species)

plot_id text,
 			path smallint,
 			row smallint,
 			wrs character(1),
 			asc_desc character(1) default 'D',
 			primary_key (plot_id,path,row,wrs,asc_desc)

plot_id text,
 			h smallint,
 			v smallint,
 			primary_key (plot_id)

processx.command:
plot_id text,
			obs_date date,
			infiltration real,
			root_pen_depth real,
			texture varchar,
			primary_key (plot_id,acquisition_date)

plot_id text,
			obs_date date,
			infiltration real,
			root_pen_depth real,
			primary_key (plot_id, acquisition_date)
